Behaviors Library


The 
Behaviors Library
 is a collection of code bundles that can be easily attached to corona display objects to give them specific game and app behaviors.


-- Load two behaviors
local randMover = require 
behaviors.dummy.randMover

local randColor = require 
behaviors.dummy.randColor


-- Create an object.
local obj = newRect( layers.content, centerX-100, centerY, {} )

-- Create a list of behaviors to attach (optionally initializing behaviors with custom settings)
local behaviorsList = { 
    randColor( { colors = { _R_, _G_, _B_, _Y_  } } ),
    randMover( { delta = 10 } ),    
}

-- Attach the behaviors to the objects.. and done!
behaviors.attach( obj, behaviorsList )




Note:
  While the behaviors themselves are free, but they require the 
Behaviors Manager
 Plugin(#plugins) to work.

Templates


Templates
 are "complete games and applications," designed for you to learn from and to create with these primary goals:




Provide a starting point for you to make your own games and apps by reskinning.


Provide a starting point for you to expand and extend the game/app concept.


Keep game and app development simple and fun.










Product


Description












SUPERCHARGING 
Corona SDK
 game development every day.  
Get It Now!






Action Pack #1


One basic template and five game starters: 'Flappy Bird', 'Escape', 'Bouncing Ball 2', 'Flappy Color', and 'Circle'.






Asteroids


A basic implementation of the classic game "Asteroids," one of the foundational games that all serious game developers should re-make at least once because it explores some truly fundamental mechanics like movement, scoring, levels, spawning, single-screen camera with wrapping, etc.






Musical Memory


This template contains the source code, art, and sounds necessary to create a "Simon"-like game with Corona. This is a great starter project for new developers who want to learn about basic object creation, touches, sounds, and simple game logic.






Pig (Dice Game)


This template contains the source code, art, and sounds necessary to create the dice game "Pig" using Corona. This is a great starter project for new developers who want to learn about basic object creation, touches, sounds, and simple AI.






Sliding Puzzle


This set contains basic "Sliding Puzzle" game templates suitable for new game developers. It comes with three (3) versions of the game.






Tic-Tac-Toe


Tic-Tac-Toe is one of the fundamental games all beginning game developers should make. This package comes with five (5) versions of the game.






Balloon Pop


Basic "Pop the Balloons" game suitable for new game developers. Comes with three (3) versions of the game.






Breakout


This is a basic "Breakout"-style game suitable for new game developers. It comes with four (4) versions of the game.






Whack-a-Mole


"Whack-a-Mole" is an often-overlooked game that all new developers should re-make at least once. This package comes with four (4) versions of the game.






Missile Command


"Missile Command" is a classic game that introduces fundamental game development concepts. Includes four versions of game.

newEmitter()
 function.








Requesting Something


Do you have a cool idea?  Am I missing a product that is critical to your game or app?


Whatever the case, you can ask me to make it 
HERE
.  Just make a post with these details:




Title
 - Roaming Gamer: Can You Make XYZ?


Body
 - Describe the thing you want me to make.  Try to be as clear as possible.




I will respond as soon as I see the post and we will proceed from there.  


Thank You!
